DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect green tea body weight , waist circumference , metabolic profile , inflammation , blood pressure endothelial function obese pre-hypertensive woman .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Green Tea Obese Pre-hypertensive Women
DOC.detailed_description: Crossover randomize control double-blinded trial . Twenty woman obesity pre-hypertension , age 28-59 year , stable body weight randomized receive daily supplement 3 capsule contain either 500mg green tea extract ( GTE ) match placebo 4 week , washout period 2 week treatment . Endothelial function evaluate peripheral arterial tonometry method , use Endo-PAT 2000Â® .
DOC.criteria: prehypertensive woman obese adult pregnant smoker elderly
